Avatars

Create an avatar of different sizes.

To get a rounded avatar add .avatar and then choose between three different sizes: .avatar-sm, .avatar-md and .avatar-lg.

    
        <img class="avatar avatar-sm" src="assets/img/tim-schoch.jpg" alt="Tim Schoch">
        <img class="avatar avatar-md" src="assets/img/tim-schoch.jpg" alt="Tim Schoch">
        <img class="avatar avatar-lg" src="assets/img/tim-schoch.jpg" alt="Tim Schoch">
